name: LaFinestra
0:
”Alexa, tell Window Guru the window in the bathroom is open.”
”Alexa, ask Window Guru which windows are open.”
”Alexa, tell Window Guru the window in the bedroom was closed.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: window guru
des:
Window Guru wants to help you keep track on open windows.

Weather warnings and reminders are planned for later.

tell Window Guru the window in the bedroom was opened.
tell Window Guru the window in the living room is open.
tell Window Guru the window in the bathroom is open.
tell Window Guru the window in the kitchen is open.
tell Window Guru the window of Michael is open.
ask Window Guru which windows are open.
tell Window Guru the window in the bedroom was closed.
tell Window Guru that all windows are closed.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
